field.name: responsive_template
field.label: Enabled Responsive?
field.description: If you Enable this parameter you will have a Responsive template , which will fit in every screen resolution. Such as smartphone and tablets. (Yes is recommended)

field.name: logo
field.label: Site Logo
field.description: Select your website logo image from your computer and chose it as the default logo.

field.name: social_icons
field.label: Social Icons
field.description: Chose if you want to show the social icons box

field.name: social_icon_facebook
field.label: Show Facebook Icon?
field.description: Wwheter to show or not the Facebok icon (on the sidebar)

field.name: social_icon_facebook_user
field.label: Facebook Fan Page Username
field.description: Enter here your Facebook Fan Page Username

field.name: social_icon_twitter
field.label: Show Twitter Icon?
field.description: Whether to show or not the Facebook icon (on the sidebar)

field.name: social_icon_twitter_user
field.label: Twitter Username
field.description: Enter here your Twitter Username

field.name: social_icon_youtube
field.label: Show Youtube Icon?
field.description: Whether to show or not the Youtube icon (on the sidebar)

field.name: social_icon_youtube_user
field.label: Youtube Username
field.description: Enter Your Youtube Username

field.name: social_icon_google
field.label: Show Google+ Icon?
field.description: Whether to show or not the Google+ icon (on the sidebar)

field.name: social_icon_google_user
field.label: Google ID
field.description: Enter Your Google ID

field.name: social_icon_linkedin
field.label: Show Linkedin Icon?
field.description: Whether to show or not the Linkedin icon (on the sidebar)

field.name: social_icon_linkedin_user
field.label: Linkedin Username
field.description: Enter Your Linkedin Company Name

field.name: social_icon_rss
field.label: Show RSS Feed Icon?
field.description: Whether to show or not the RSS Feed icon (on the sidebar)

field.name: social_icon_rss_link
field.label: RSS Feed URL
field.description: Enter here your RSS Feed URL

field.name: sidebar_position
field.label: Sidebar Position
field.description: Chose if you want to show sidebar to left or right.

field.name: sidebar_span
field.label: Sidebar Width
field.description: The width of the main sidebar. Normal is recommended

field.name: homepage_content
field.label: Hide Frontpage content?
field.description: Would you like to hide the content (Joomla content) on the frontpage? Enable this feature only if you plan to use only modules on the frontpage

field.name: equal_columns
field.label: Enable Equal Columns?
field.description: Would you like to enable the Equal height columns to have the same height for all the columns?

field.name: icelogo
field.label: IceTheme Logo
field.description: Choose whether you want to keep the IceTheme logo or not. (Not obligatory)

field.name: go2top
field.label: Go To Top Link
field.description: Would you like to enable a scrolling image on the bottom right of your website so that you members can scroll to top easily?

field.name: custom_css_code
field.label: Custom CSS
field.description: You may enter here your Custom CSS code to overwrite the default CSS that we have added on the template. Also you may paste here CSS codes that our support team may have given to you.

field.name: comingsoon_enable
field.label: Enable Coming Soon Page?
field.description: This will put the site temporarily offline and display a message to your visitors telling when the site will be ready online

field.name: comingsoon_h2
field.label: Page Heading
field.description: Enter the main heading for your Coming Soon page

field.name: comingsoon_p
field.label: Page Descrption
field.description: Enter some description for your website

field.name: comingsoon_count
field.label: Enable Countdown?
field.description: Would you like to enable the animated jQuery countdown?. If set to yes enter the correct time below

field.name: comingsoon_count_time
field.label: Countdown time
field.description: Enter here the correct time format when your website will be online. E.g '31 December 2013 12:00:00'

field.name: comingsoon_newsletter
field.label: Newsletter Code
field.description: Enter here your Newsletter code provided by the Newsleter company

field.name: comingsoon_social
field.label: Social Media
field.description: Enter here your HTML code to generate the Social Icons
